item.title: How the West was won: K-pop's great assimilation gambit
item.description: The crossover hits stacking Grammy nods this year have little in common with the culture that birthed them â€” but they're winning the chart game.

item.title: Medicare Advantage insurers face new curbs on overcharges in Trump plan
item.description: Federal officials have a plan that could curb billions of dollars in overpayments to Medicare Advantage plans. But will they follow through on it?

item.title: Border czar says he plans to "draw down" ICE and CBP operations in Minnesota
item.description: Tom Homan, who took over leadership of the surge in Minneapolis, says he is working on a plan to reduce the force of federal agents in the Twin Cities...

item.title: Senate fails to advance spending bills as Democrats push for DHS reforms
item.description: Senators blocked a package of six spending bills that includes funding for the Department of Homeland Security as Democrats continue to push for refor...

item.title: Why these women break the law to sell their eggs for IVF
item.description: Women in India were told they couldn't be paid for their eggs. The result: a black market for eggs from women in need of money to survive.
